name: siddeswarapradeep
content: Be-practical is one of the best platform for all non-technical and technical background students. I did MBA 2017 I m learning lots of things in institute.I like faculty and I feel that I had very best platform for my carrier. I learned many new things from my teachers who were very helpful in every way they could. Teachers and students interaction was good and they are very friendly which I could clarify many of my doubts in the course. I appreciate faculty for their quick response and for great supportive, and Very special thanks to HR Kavitha Mam she is very kind and I always thankfull to her  support and guidance . Thank you

name: Naik Harshith
content: I was a complete beginner when I started the MERN stack course at Be Practical, but the instructors were able to take me from zero in a matter of weeks. The curriculum was well-organized and easy to follow, and the instructors were always available to answer my questions. I would highly recommend Be practical tech solutions to anyone who is looking for a comprehensive and affordable MERN stack course.

name: Mohammed Rayan MB
content: Be Practical is the best institute for Fullstack courses. The reason is they have well-experienced faculty. My trainer Mr Ganesh is doing a great job. the way his teaching is excellent. Whatever the questions we have asked, he is explaining all the questions. His feeding is good. The environment is good and friendly.

name: BHIMARAYA H
content: I had a great experience learning the MERN stack at Be Practical. The instructors were knowledgeable and engaging, and the curriculum was well-structured. I felt confident in my skills after completing the course, and I was able to land a job as a MERN developer shortly after. I would highly recommend Be Practical to anyone who is interested in learning the MERN stack.

name: Sohan Gs
content: Be practical is one of the best institute for software courses in Bangalore after entering this institute i gain more knowledge. All faculties are supported for me and most rated courses are there in this institute. I can only say thanks to all teaching and non teaching facilities.

name: Sangamesh Goudar
content: Be practical is the best Institute of training and placement, I came from civil background, so i need to get job IT field, initially I struggled to get job in IT, then one of my friend suggested me to go Be practical, so i joined with Be practical. I got good technical skills of core java and placed in young minds technology so thanks to Be practical.

name: pr rao
content: So far the best institute and that is even placement friendly and also even they help with all the basic and industry needed topics and projects. I was very well gudied as where I should improve my self so that I can be job ready anytime. HR and trainers are easily accessible and they will help and answer my needs when needed, even though I was fresher just out of collage i was also gudied with DSA topics and even mock interview sessions and even activities on special events.

content: Be practical is the best institute . I have completed  my  training on Digital  Marketing . Thanks for  giving  me this opportunity  to be a part of this  institution and thank you every one.

name: udaya kumara
content: I am satisfied with the course they offer. Their faculty Ganesh sir is amazing. He is cooperative and friendly. Being a student from IIM, I had many expectations from Be Practical Institute and I m glad that they all r fulfilled. Ganesh sir has immense knowledge and he has delivered that knowledge very diligently. It nice Environment and a Great Opportunity to grow in our careers.

name: Prithviraj Patil
content: I recently had the opportunity to attend a training program The curriculum was well-structured and tailored to meet the specific needs of the participants. The courses were comprehensive, and the content was up-to-date with the latest industry trends. I appreciated the hands-on approach, which allowed me to apply the knowledge gained immediately.

name: Vishal Raj N
content: Hii, Myself Vishal, I joined Be-Practical Tech Solutions for Python Full Stack Developer Course in order to upgrade my skills. Although I am still an engineering student pursuing 6th semester Thanks to be-practical they provided me good environment to learn and special thanks to Namitha Mam, Kavitha Mam and all my Mentors who taught me really well and been supportive with me throughout my Journey. Thank You Be-Practicald

name: Krishna kurdekar
content: My self Krishna, I Joined Be-Practical Tech Solutions for MERN full stack Course for improve my career. I am MCA graduate from 2022 passed out. Thanks to all Be-Practical  Family supported to Build my soft and hard skills. Special thanks to Kavita Mam for support to get placed in Mverve Technologies.

name: HARSHITH S
content: I recently completed a MERN FULL STACK at this institute and I can confidently say that it was a great experience. The faculty members were knowledgeable, approachable, and supportive, which helped me to succeed academically and professionally. Javeed sir and Ganesh sir are excellent teachers and helped me to better understand the course and the subject... they clarified all my doubts with patience...The curriculum was well-designed and provided me with the skills and knowledge I needed to succeed in my field. The facilities were modern and well-equipped, and the resources available to students were abundant. The institute also provided a variety of student support services, such as career counseling and academic advising, which were very helpful. And also HR were very helpful and Kavitha Ma'am helped me in placement aspects. Overall, I had a fantastic experience at this institute and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking to further their education and career

name: Smita Jagannath
content: This institute provides hands-on IT training that is relevant and up-to-date with industry trends. The instructors are highly approachable and supportive, creating a positive and interactive learning atmosphere. I appreciated the personalized attention given to each student, which helped me progress quickly

name: Shubhankar Satpathy
content: Good institute, but time we are facing is recession where the freshers have to suffer the most!! But somehow they are trying their best to land any individual a job. Can't expect more from any institute.. !! Thanks to Kavitha mam and the management team as they are trying their best ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Being The Incredible
content: Thank you Be Practical team which helped me in all aspects of my career, I took a Java Full stack course in Be Practical where they taught me all the aspects of Java and its frameworks which really helped me today to get placed in one of the top MNC , Thank you again for your support .

name: Rupa Manasa
content: Be practical is a best training n placement Institute I have got placed as a software developer in YoungMinds Technology. It's a  best training Institute in Bangalore.

name: Praveen Rao
content: Well trained And professional Trainers. Institute is very flexible. They have regular activities for students on weekends to improve soft skills. Hiring team (Hr) is very much motivated and keeps us on updating new opportunities. I Joined in the month of March and then discontinued and again joined again back in June for back-end Finding a institute who is flexible enough and understanding students problem is also a plus. Hr team keep encouraging us to new opportunities and help us with notes and reference links to practice and keep us well trained. I joined here to give a new start to web development and I did get full support from Hr team and other support staff and that's why I work in a esteem Organization today. Thank you Kavitha mam, Ganesh Sir, Asha Mam, Harish sir.

name: Pooja Reddy.Y
content: I am very much happy being a student of Be Practical Bangalore because of their support I am building my career. Thank you so much all teaching and non-teaching staff.

name: Nandy Sandy
content: Thanks to Be-Practical the best decision made by me to start my career.I got trained here. I am thankful to( HR) for the support and encouragement.I got placed in good company with good pay.

name: Mohammed Zubair. AZ
content: Most talented trainers are there in this institute, I have learn so many things in this institute. I did MERN full stack course and it is one of the best decision of my life.

name: Harish K
content: Hello Everyone, I joined for the MERN full stack Course in BE-PRACTICAL and got Placed in Mverve Company,The training  was good and the HR assisted well.

name: MAC TIPS
content: Best institute for freshers and experienced candidates I was an experienced candidate and I took the MERN full-stack course now i am working at a top MNC Thank you Be Practical for your humble support.

name: chandana v
content: I recently completed a training program at Be Practical Training Institute, and I had a fantastic experience throughout. The institute provided me with a comprehensive and well-structured curriculum that covered all the necessary aspects of the MERN stack. The trainers were knowledgeable, experienced, and dedicated to helping us understand the concepts thoroughly. The institute's placement assistance was commendable. They actively supported us in preparing for interviews, providing valuable guidance and resources. They also connected us with reputed companies and facilitated the placement process. I felt well-prepared and confident when facing interviews, thanks to the mock interviews and practical training provided by Be Practical.  Thank you bepractical

name: dinesh bhukta
content: I joined Be-Practical for MERN STACK DEVELOPMENT Course and after completion i got placed in Smartters' Software as a FullStack Developer.After joining Be-Practical i got good and sharp knowledge about Web Development.A very big thanks to Ganesh Sir and Javed Sir for the guidance throughout the Course.Thanks to Prema Mam for guiding me for the placements and give confidence to attend  the interviews.Thanks to Asha Mam for the support and motivates me throughout the course completion. A very big thanks to the whole Be-Practical family for the support. If you want to start your career in IT/Software field, then Be-Practical is the best institute in Banglore.

name: Sharanya SP
content: I had a great time doing my MERN stack course in be practical and everyone involved during this tenure like trainer,HR and counciling team were very supportive and excellent in my journey thanks to be practical

name: Sunaina Sonu
content: After completion of my degree I was wondering what to do next one of my friends suggested I join the MEARN full-stack course in Be Practical .trainer Mr Javeed guided me and helped me to understand the course st of the classes were practically related, thanks to my trainer Javeed.

name: Somnath Patil
content: Good training institute and well mentors, are very well explained regarding software courses curriculum in present software market time!!!!! Thanks to the team  Be Practical
